attributes.action: Simplify taxation to two types, INCOME and VAT.  All others cost too much to implement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The complexity of taxation causes great difficulty in collecting and administering.  They are also unfair in virtually every case.  Income is a simple basis for taxation as is expenditure.  Virtually all other taxes are unfair on one sector or another.  Sell a house for £119,999 NO TAX, add one penny and pay tax on the whole £120,000.  Save all your life and not purchase highly taxed goods and when you die your children will be taxed on the inheritance.  Petition for a TWO TAX SYSTEM FOR THE UK.  Simple, cheap and virtually inescapable.  Please support this petition.  Thank you.
